name: Better than Alone
description:
Better than Alone is an interactive novella about repetition and death. It is set in the midst of Melbourne's 2020 lockdown.

Your name is Lottie Gill-Soren.
You care for Carl Quincy Durrant.
And the house he lives in is haunted.

The intended experience for this game is the "Extended Version" (play time roughly 45m-1h). For a shorter experience for those who are time-poor, try the "Truncated Version" (play time roughly 30m).
